CustomField.description: A unique key for the "Drift Related Opportunity" junction object created by joining the "Drift Conversation" object Salesforce ID to the "Opportunity" object Salesforce ID.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A unique key for the "Drift Related Opportunity" junction object created by joining the "Drift Conversation" object Salesforce ID to the "Opportunity" object Salesforce ID.
CustomField.label: ConversationOppKey
